entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. ("I’m just going to teach you the rules this evening, then you’ll be joining team practice three times a week.")

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. ("McGonagall meant ... you really are a natural.")

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played on broomsticks at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. ("Now, Quidditch is easy enough to understand, even if it’s not too easy to play.")

entities.name: chasers
entities.description: A position in the Quidditch team. ("Three of them are called Chasers.")

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The ball used in Quidditch. ("This ball’s called the Quaffle.")

relationships.description: Wood is teaching Harry Potter about Quidditch. ("I’m just going to teach you the rules this evening, then you’ll be joining team practice three times a week.")
Harry Potter is playing Quidditch. ("Now, Quidditch is easy enough to understand, even if it’s not too easy to play.")
Wood uses the Quaffle in teaching Harry Potter about Quidditch. ("This ball’s called the Quaffle.")
